title: photo management api list photos
description: Test the photo management API endpoint for listing photos to ensure it returns the correct list of photos stored locally with proper response format and status code.

title: photo management api upload photo
description: Verify the photo upload API endpoint accepts valid photo files, stores them correctly, and returns a success response with appropriate status code.

title: photo management api delete photo
description: Check the photo deletion API endpoint to confirm it deletes the specified photo from local storage and returns a success response or appropriate error if the photo does not exist.

title: ai image generation api generate image
description: Test the AI image generation API endpoint by sending valid prompts and verifying that it returns generated images within expected time frames and with correct response structure.

title: hardware control api eink display update
description: Validate the hardware control API endpoint that updates the E-Ink display to ensure it correctly sends commands to the display and handles errors gracefully.

title: hardware control api battery status
description: Test the battery status API endpoint to verify it accurately reports the PiSugar battery state and handles hardware communication errors properly.

title: configuration api update settings
description: Verify the configuration API endpoint allows updating device settings and that changes are reflected correctly in the device behavior and persisted in config files.

title: frontend backend communication
description: Test the communication between frontend and backend APIs to ensure no CORS or proxy errors occur and that errors are logged and traceable according to the debugging guide.
